description: When snow flurries start to fly, here's your do-it-all winter staple. Pull-on this soft stretch fleece midlayer before a session at Ouray Ice Park or at basecamp in the Himalayas. This core-hugging Polartec® weave holds high insulation power, while pulling moisture away from skin to keep you feeling comfortable and dry on snowshoe runs, skin track schusses, and everything in between.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Power Stretch Pro 1/4 Zip - Mens
